mapper.select: select count(*) from TBL_REFUND f join TBL_REFUNDBEC b on f.REFUNDBEC_SEQ = b.REFUNDBEC_SEQ join TBL_PAYMENT p on p.PAY_SEQ = f.PAY_SEQ join TBL_RESERVATION r on r.RESERVATION_SEQ = p.RESERVATION_SEQ join TBL_USER u on u.USERID = r.USERID
mapper.update: update TBL_REFUND set compflag='Y', refund_cancle_ok=sysdate where refund_seq=#{refundSeq}
update TBL_PAYMENT set pay_condition='C' where pay_seq=#{paySeq}
mapper.select: select booking from TBL_RESERVATION where reservation_seq=#{resSeq}
mapper.update: update TBL_TICKET set selled=selled-#{selled} where ticket_seq=#{ticketSeq}
update TBL_USER set mileagepoint=mileagepoint+#{mileagePoint} where userid=#{userid}
